app.backend.visualization.helpers package¶

Submodules¶

app.backend.visualization.helpers.get_and_process_image module¶

The module to obtain an image by the URL and process it.

app.backend.visualization.helpers.get_and_process_image.get_and_process_image(url: str) → _io.BytesIO¶

Get the image by the URL, then crop it into a circle using numpy and Pillow, and return cropped version of the image.

Args:

url: the URL to the image we need to get and process.

Returns:

io.BytesIO: the io.BytesIO object that contains processed image.

app.backend.visualization.helpers.limit_string module¶

The module to limit a string to a specific length and put ellipsis after reaching the quota.

app.backend.visualization.helpers.limit_string.split_string_in_words_with_len_limit(string: str, limit=45) → str¶

Get string and limit it to the length specified as limit, put ellipsis after reaching the quota.

Args:

string: the string that should be limited to a specific length.

limit: the int value showing to which number of symbols the string should be limited.

Returns:

str: the limited string with an ellipsis at the end (if initial length has exceeded the quota.)

Module contents¶

The helpers for the visualization module.
